cause.description:
Why do people who hurt animals get to just pay a fine and then it's over wile the animals suffer for the rest of there lives.That's BULL SHIT. Put there ass in jail!!
1. it has to STOP they love us so much and then people treat them like shit so why not return the favor.
cause.mission: put there ass in jail for at least 12 years then maybe they will learn
cause.name: sick fuckers
